name: astro-resume-astro-geeks
title: Astro Resume - Astro Geeks
desc: Fully responsive with CMS integrated template to boost your Portfolio visibility online.
article:
Astro Resume is a super light, popular, and responsive portfolio website for all the people around the world.

It can be easily used and customized for various purposes like Showing your Skills , Resume and portfolio.

It is built with Astro JS.

It also provides integration of Tinacms for all content management stuff.


Features

  • Easy to edit
  • No coding required
  • Web3FORM Integration
  • TinaCMS Integrated
  • Beautiful scroll effects on page scroll
  • Responsive Design
  • The behavior of Single-Page design
  • Showcase of your Projects and Skiils
  • Ready for Production and easy to Rank
